mode.name: get_vulnerable_packages
mode.query: SELECT pn.name AS vulnerablepkgname, a.fix_version AS vulnerablepkgfixversion FROM suseVEXAnnotations a JOIN suseOVALPlatform p ON p.id = a.platform_id JOIN rhnPackageName pn ON pn.id = a.package_name JOIN rhnCve c ON c.id = a.cve_id WHERE p.cpe = :product_cpe AND c.name = :cve_name

mode.name: can_audit_cve
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM suseVEXAnnotations a JOIN rhnCve c ON c.id = a.cve_id WHERE c.name = :cve_name LIMIT 1

mode.name: check_vex_availability
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM suseVEXAnnotations a JOIN suseOVALPlatform p ON p.id = a.platform_id WHERE p.cpe = :cpe LIMIT 1

mode.name: check_errata_availability
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM suseCVEServerChannel, rhnChannelErrata WHERE suseCVEServerChannel.channel_id = rhnChannelErrata.channel_id AND server_id = :server_id

write-mode.name: clear_oval_metadata_by_platform
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM suseOVALPlatformVulnerablePackage pvp WHERE pvp.platform_id = (SELECT id FROM suseOVALPlatform plat WHERE plat.cpe = :cpe); DELETE FROM suseOVALPlatform plat where plat.cpe = :cpe;
